Title: The Hallowed Path
Description:
$p, I'm glad our paths have crossed. Adelgonn has been telling me about a cavern called Hallowfall.

She's told me the people there are called the Arathi. I cannot imagine that they are related to the ancient human kingdom, but it can't be a coincidence.

Adelgonn's people had fruitful contact with them some time ago. Whatever happened, I hope to repair that relationship and gain their aid. Please meet me at the Hallowfall Gate.
ObjectivesText: Meet with the denizens of Hallowfall.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Speak to Faerin at Dunelle's Kindness in Hallowfall.
RewardText:
Friendly outsiders are not common in Hallowfall. Only enemies emerging from the shadow. 

But you seem comfortable in the light despite how unusual you may appear. I would welcome you, were we not in the midst of a crisis.

Objectives.Text: Meet the Arathi in Dunelle's Kindness
